scripts.cy.run.live.electronANDchrome: npm run cy.run.live.spec1.electron && npm run cy.run.live.spec2.chrome
scripts.cy.run.cloud.live.spec1.13.chrome: npx cypress run --record --key bc5fef5f-963f-4798-8a92-0401e3154f45 --config-file cypress-live-13inch.config.js -b chrome -s 'cypress/e2e/pageObjectTests'
scripts.cy.run.cloud.live.spec2.24.electron: npx cypress run --record --key bc5fef5f-963f-4798-8a92-0401e3154f45 --config-file cypress-live-24inch.config.js -b electron -s 'cypress/e2e/verifierTests'
scripts.cy.parallel: npm run cy.run.cloud.live.spec1.13.chrome -- --group Chrome --ci-build-id 4 --parallel & npm run cy.run.cloud.live.spec2.24.electron -- --group electron --ci-build-id 4 --parallel
